name.en: The Prefect Team's Change of Pace
name.jp: The Prefect Team's Change of Pace

desc.en: After working hard to crack down on rule-breakers on the beach, Iori tries to enjoy her break time by sunbathing in secret, but Sensei catches her.
desc.jp: After working hard to crack down on rule-breakers on the beach, Iori tries to enjoy her break time by sunbathing in secret, but Sensei catches her.
desc.zh_cn: 在海边认真纠正校规违反者的{cf伊织}趁着休息时间享受日光浴，却被老师看见了。

hobby.jp: パトロール、大声を出すこと

realname.zh_cn: 不变的平凡 钢琴版

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

不变的平凡 钢琴版

name.en: The Girl Fights with the Ocean
name.jp: The Girl Fights with the Ocean

desc.en: As Sensei and Izumi head to the ocean in search of a new delicacy, they're suddenly attacked by an octopus. Sensei is barely able to hold back Izumi, who was running rampant saying that she will eat it before she gets eaten herself.
desc.jp: As Sensei and Izumi head to the ocean in search of a new delicacy, they're suddenly attacked by an octopus. Sensei is barely able to hold back Izumi, who was running rampant saying that she will eat it before she gets eaten herself.
desc.zh_cn: 跟老师一起寻找美味料理而来到海边的{cf泉}，却突然遭到章鱼袭击。{cf泉}嚷嚷着与其自己被吃掉不如先抓章鱼来吃，老师好不容易才阻止她。

hobby.jp: ゲテモノ料理を食べること、作ること
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 制作古怪食物、吃古怪食物
hobby.zh_cn_cn: 制作黑暗料理、享用黑暗料理

name.en: The Head Prefect Needs a Break
name.jp: The Head Prefect Needs a Break

desc.en: Ako says that Hina's complexion doesn't look well and declares that Hina will be given a vacation during the Prefect Team's summer boot camp.
desc.jp: Ako says that Hina's complexion doesn't look well and declares that Hina will be given a vacation during the Prefect Team's summer boot camp.
desc.zh_cn: {cn风纪委员会}行政官{cf亚子}注意到{cf阳奈}委员长最近的表现很奇怪，认为他太过劳累。于是，打算以「{cn风纪委员会}夏季集训」的名义前往海边，送给{cf阳奈}委员长一个暑假。为了奇普托斯的{cf未来}，紧急特务命令发布了。

hobby.jp: パトロール、大声を出すこと

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

realname.zh_cn: 不变的平凡 钢琴版

desc.en: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?
desc.jp: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?
desc.zh_cn: 为了让{cf阳奈}能好好休个假，{cn风纪委员会}和老师一起来到了海边。但麻烦事却接二连三地发生，使得{cn风纪委员会}陷入一片慌乱……{cf阳奈}委员长的暑假，究竟会如何呢！？

desc.en: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?
desc.jp: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?
desc.zh_cn: 为了让{cf阳奈}能好好休个假，{cn风纪委员会}和老师一起来到了海边。但麻烦事却接二连三地发生，使得{cn风纪委员会}陷入一片慌乱……{cf阳奈}委员长的暑假，究竟会如何呢！？

name.en: Plans Are Destined to Go Awry
name.jp: Plans Are Destined to Go Awry

desc.en: Sensei assumes the role of keeping Hina distracted while Ako, Iori, and Chinatsu block the troublemakers. Sensei has to go and deal with the stronger-than-expected counterattack from the troublemakers when things get out of hand.
desc.jp: Sensei assumes the role of keeping Hina distracted while Ako, Iori, and Chinatsu block the troublemakers. Sensei has to go and deal with the stronger-than-expected counterattack from the troublemakers when things get out of hand.
desc.zh_cn: 在{cf亚子}、{cf伊织}与{cf千夏}领导的{cn风纪委员会}正在与问题儿童战斗时，老师拜访了{cf阳奈}。{cf亚子}本来是要老师将委员长留在房间里的，但战斗比想像中还要激烈，老师多次被呼唤。老师一边设法欺骗{cf阳奈}，一边反复指挥战斗。

desc.zh_cn: 全体就绪，准备战斗！举例/联想：Encroached Sky、Polyphonic

name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
一切都是为了完美的休假

desc.en: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?
desc.jp: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?
desc.zh_cn: 为了让{cf阳奈}能好好休个假，{cn风纪委员会}和老师一起来到了海边。但麻烦事却接二连三地发生，使得{cn风纪委员会}陷入一片慌乱……{cf阳奈}委员长的暑假，究竟会如何呢！？

desc.en: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?
desc.jp: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?
desc.zh_cn: 为了让{cf阳奈}能好好休个假，{cn风纪委员会}和老师一起来到了海边。但麻烦事却接二连三地发生，使得{cn风纪委员会}陷入一片慌乱……{cf阳奈}委员长的暑假，究竟会如何呢！？

desc.en: Hina lets out a sigh at Ako's excuse that she was looking out for her. Hina then smiles as she declares that the summer boot camp isn't over yet, and that the real grueling training has only begun.
desc.jp: Hina lets out a sigh at Ako's excuse that she was looking out for her. Hina then smiles as she declares that the summer boot camp isn't over yet, and that the real grueling training has only begun.
desc.zh_cn: 听完{cf亚子}的一番说明后，{cf阳奈}叹了口气。虽然他觉得能好好休息也不错，但也同时宣布「集训从现在起重新开始」。当风纪委员们陷入绝望时，{cf阳奈}在老师的耳边低声说道「之后要补偿唷」并静静微笑着。
